## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install safepyrun in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure safepyrun package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to safepyrun
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/AnswerDotAI/safepyrun):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/AnswerDotAI/safepyrun.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/AnswerDotAI/safepyrun)

``` sh
$ conda install -c AnswerDotAI safepyrun
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/safepyrun/)

``` sh
$ pip install safepyrun
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/AnswerDotAI/safepyrun)’s
[pages](https://AnswerDotAI.github.io/safepyrun/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/AnswerDotAI/safepyrun) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/safepyrun/) respectively.
